children.text: Holding space while not grabbing an anticucho locks direction.
Only triggers when an anticucho with that UID exists.

parameters.text: Function.Call("eLevel/Movement.is_space_valid", spr_player.grid_x - 1, spr_player.grid_y) & newline & Function.Call("eLevel/Movement.can_move_anticucho", spr_anticucho.UID, "left") & newline & round(time)

children.text: I check them in reverse order to not overwrite the ones I've changed.
I check them in reverse order to not overwrite the ones I've changed.
